'''Paimon's Chocolate Factory''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 2.4]].

The "Paimon's Chocolate Factory" Web Event has begun. Come and make winter chocolate together with Paimon!

Whoa... it smells so delicious! It's a huge pot filled with chocolate!

Traveler, make chocolate together with Paimon! Paimon swears not to swipe any!

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2022-02-10 00:00

===Requirements===
* A Facebook account
* A mobile device

===Summary===
Follow the instructions to complete the jigsaw puzzle and make winter chocolates with Paimon. You can also obtain rewards such as Hero's Wit and Mora!

Users on mobile devices will need to log into their Facebook account to participate in this event. For PC users, click the link and scan the QR code to participate.
==Rewards==
Participants can redeem a unique code after solving the jigsaw puzzle for rewards.

{{Card|Mora|20000}}{{Card|Hero's Wit|3}}
